basics.name: Martin Beaumont
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Martin Beaumont from Laval, France. He has earned degrees from the University of Le Mans (but studied in Laval). Before becoming a freelancer, he did two work-study contracts as Web Developer.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: As a freelance, I work with medium-sized companies and artists to create custom CMS and CRM with Symfony, WordPress websites, or mail integration. I always keep in mind good accessibility and performances practices to build better websites.
highlights: Creation, maintenance, and evolution of a stock and booking management system for a audiovisual equipment rental company
Development of web portfolio for various artists

work.name: Luminess, formerly Jouve
work.description: Luminess is a major player in the French digital ecosystem, their teams combine expertise and broad business knowledge with robust technological know-how.
work.summary: At Jouve, with a team of 16 people called "Web CMS", I worked on various projects from webservices development for banks to custom CMS creation for an open-data site of the French government.
highlights: Work on the CMS and open-data processes for poem.travail-emploi.gouv.fr
Build microservices with Symfony 2 / 4 for bank documents management

work.name: Maine Image Santé
work.description: Maine Image Santé is a radiology and medical imaging company, based in Le Mans and other towns around.
work.summary: I worked in the IT team of Maine Image Santé, with 3 IT managers, to create a new version of their website. I've realized meetings with healt specialists to undertstand their needs and write medical exams description articles.
highlights: Build a WordPress website, with a custom-made theme
Project management with health specialists, articles writing

references.name: Thomas Brunet - Thommy
references.reference: I contacted Martin for the realization of my website during the year. My request was precise and he was able to answer it perfectly. Despite the returns that were sometimes out of budget, they were carried out without problem. And above all the responsiveness and the deadlines for completion make him an excellent professional

references.name: Louis Roy - Thurb
references.reference: A multi-skilled web developer ! Martin is very professional, responsive and attentive to the customer! He was able to meet my expectations as needed. A pleasure to work with him, I can only recommend him !

projects.name: SosCine
projects.description: SosCine is an audiovisual equipment rental company in Paris. With over 6,500 rentals completed in 2021, my job is to add new features, improve workflows, and ensure the proper fucntioning of the application.
highlights: Custom-made Web application based on Symfony
Manages stocks, bookings, invoices, supports and more
Actively maintained and evolved since the beginning of the project

projects.name: Thommy' portfolio
projects.description: Thommy is a motion designer, working mainly for French streamers. After a first version in 2018, he asked me to do a new version of his web portfolio.
highlights: Dark-mode and mobile-first design, using Tailwind CSS

projects.name: Thurb' portfolio
projects.description: Thurb is a graphic designer, doing illustrations for various content creator, store, or places. In 2020, he asked me to build his web portfolio based on its models.
highlights: Build on WordPress with a custom-made theme, using Advanced Custom Fields
Cache highly optimized on client and server sides, to accept a large amount of simultaneous requests
Using modern CSS features such as Grid display and Scroll Snap
